verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: basked] [ARG1: in the adoration of a Thursday night rally in Indiana , the home state of Vice President Mike Pence] , [ARGM-TMP: as the two men sought to use the president ’s recent moves on North Korea , Iran , tax cuts and his pledge for a border wall to inspire Republicans to unseat the incumbent Indiana Democrat in a key Senate race in November] .
